News

02/17/2022 [EVENT]
Dr. Jian Tao helped create the Data Science Ambassador Scholarship Program that solicits applications from Texas A&M Ph.D. students who wish to serve as representatives for TAMIDS and champions for Data Science literacy in their departments.

02/15/2022 [EVENT]
Dr. Jian Tao helped organize the 2022 Student Data Science Competition hosted by Texas A&M Institute of Data Science.

02/14/2022 [GRANT]
Dr. Jian Tao and Andre Thomas received a grant through the TAMIDS Course Development Program to develop a course on digital twins.

02/08/2022 [EVENT]
Dr. Jian Tao hosted the Online Digital Twin Workshop to help identify and bring together members of the academic community at Texas A&M who are interested in studying and building digital twins.

02/01/2022 [GRANT]
The Texas A&M team co-led by Dr. Jian Tao was awarded nearly $1.2M for the NIST Public Safety Innovation Accelerator Program - Artificial Intelligence for IoT Information (PSAIP - AI3).

01/21/2022 [GRANT]
The TAU Group received a subaward for a project funded by NSF on West Coast Fisheries Management. The PI of the project is Dr. Piers Chapman.

01/19/2022 [GRANT]
The TAU Group received a subaward to work on one of the 2021 Catalyst Fund Projects to develop research intelligence tools that contribute to the VIVO platform: an open-source software development project.. The PI of the Texas A&M team is Dr. Bruce Herbert.

01/15/2022 [TEAM]
Revanth Reddy, a Masterâ€™s student from the Department of Computer Science & Engineering joined the group.

01/15/2022 [TEAM]
Two Ph.D. candidates from the Department of Electrical & Computer Engineering, Hieu Le and David Santos joined the group.

01/06/2022 [EVENT]
The TAU Group represented by Sree Kiran Prasad Vadaga and Dr. Jian Tao was selected as one of the 12 teams (49 participants total) to compete for the Food for Thought international competition organized by USDA and Coleridge Initiative

12/01/2021 [TEAM]
Samira Vafay Eslahi (Co-chaired by Dr. Jian Tao with Dr. Jim Ji from ECE), a Ph.D. candidate from the Department of Electrical & Computer Engineering joined the group.

11/01/2021 [TEAM]
Alyssa Cassity, an undergraduate student from the Department of Visualization, and Nina Kang, an undergraduate student from the Department of Computer Science & Engineering (Minors in Mathematics & Statistics) joined the group.

10/01/2021 [TEAM]
Sree Kiran Prasad Vadaga, a graduate student in the Master of Science in Data Science program joined the group.

09/01/2021 [GRANT]
In September 2021, the Texas A&M team co-led by Dr. Jian Tao was awarded more than $900,000 for the Public Safety Innovation Accelerator Program: Public Safety Radio Data Grant.

09/01/2021 [TEAM]
Dr. Jian Tao was appointed as the Assistant Director of the Texas A&M Institute of Data Science. He will be primarily responsible for the development of research projects relevant to data science.

09/01/2021 [TEAM]
Dr. Jian Tao joined the Department of Visualization in the College of Architecture at Texas A&M University as a tenure-track Assistant Professor. The TAU Group was born.
